content: several years ago i adapted my lizard ridge dishcloth 1 pattern to make some coasters for my knitting friends i ve had a few requests for more detailed instructions so i finally knit up another set so i could take photos of the process and wrote up a coaster-specific pattern you can find more photos of the process here 2 on my blog these knit up quickly are very forgiving of mistakes are a great way to use up leftovers and make useful gifts 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/lizard-ridge-dishcloth 2 http //tossingthestash blogspot com/2015/11/quick-gift html
